markdownRemark.html:
If women haven't fully understood the state of inferiority in which they are kept, they will do nothing but perpetuate it.

— Leïla Slimani, Sex and Lies.

frontmatter.author: Leïla Slimani
frontmatter.title: If women haven't fully understood the state of inferiority in which they are kept, they will do nothing but perpetuate it.
